mapper.sql: select group_id as groupId, group_name as groupName, description as description, member as member, ismail as ismail, ismobile as ismobile, status as status, last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, last_modify_user as lastModifyUser, is_admin as isAdmin from monitor_contact_group
mapper.insert: insert into monitor_contact_group( group_id, group_name, is_admin, description, member, ismail, ismobile, status, last_modify_time, last_modify_user ) values( #{groupId}, #{groupName}, #{isAdmin}, #{description}, #{member}, #{ismail}, #{ismobile}, #{status}, #{lastModifyTime}, #{lastModifyUser} )
mapper.update: update monitor_contact_group set group_id=#{groupId}, group_name=#{groupName}, description=#{description}, member=#{member}, ismail=#{ismail}, is_admin=#{isAdmin}, ismobile=#{ismobile}, status=#{status}, last_modify_time=#{lastModifyTime}, last_modify_user=#{lastModifyUser} where group_id=#{groupId}
